title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Uniswap (UNI) Surges 12.7% Over Weekend
summary: Internet Computer (ICP) also gained 12%, as the index traded higher.
author: CoinDesk Indices
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3293.81, up 5.5% (+171.28) since 4 p.m. ET on Friday.

All twenty assets are trading higher.

Leaders: UNI (+12.7%) and ICP (+12.0%).

Laggards: BTC (+0.8%) and BCH (+1.6%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index rose 5.5% with all twenty assets trading higher, led by UNI (+12.7%) and ICP (+12.0%), indicating broad market gains.
